name: tidy
summary: Color scheme 'tidy' based on PerlTidy's colors.
description:
" Vim color file tidy.vim based on PerlTidy syntax, http://perltidy.sourceforge.net/ written by Steve Hancock <perltidy@users.sourceforge.net>. It's on light background and very pleasant look.

Two jpegs with a sources from http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~maverick/VimColorSchemeTest/ :
http://haze.ehost.pl/pub/perl-test.jpg
http://haze.ehost.pl/pub/c-test.jpg
